techmeme.title: A US judge rules that Google must face a class action claiming Google collected users' personal data from their phones after switching off Web & App Activity (Jonathan Stempel/Reuters)
December court filing: Activision revealed that Call of Duty: Black Ops III cost $450M+ to make, Modern Warfare cost $640M+, and Black Ops Cold War cost $700M+ (Stephen Totilo/Game File)
Frank McCourt's Project Liberty says it made a formal bid to ByteDance to buy TikTok's US assets and keep the app alive without its current algorithm (Jaiveer Singh Shekhawat/Reuters)
Israeli cybersecurity startup Wiz names veteran exec Fazal Merchant as president and CFO to prepare for a US IPO; sources: Wiz has annual revenues of ~$500M (Steven Scheer/Reuters)
Innovaccer, which aggregates medical data and plans to introduce multiple AI co-pilots and agents for the healthcare industry, raised a $275M Series F (Marina Temkin/TechCrunch)
